oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The potentials of organic farming in the European Innovation Policy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Micheloni, Cristina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Systems research and participatory research
Social aspects
Networks and ownership
Technology transfer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The presentations shows how the entrepreneur organic farmers have contributed to increase the common knowledge even before the implementations of EIP-Agri. That's why they have now the best potentials for being active parts fo the different European innovation iniciatives.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Micheloni, Cristina (2014) The potentials of organic farming in the European Innovation Policy. Keynote presentation at: II Jornada Agriecol, Madrid (Spain), 10 Diciembre 2014. [Unpublished]
